title: Palantír
summary: A palantír (/ˈpælənˌtɪər/; pl. palantíri) is a fictional magical artefact from J. R. R. Tolkien's Middle-earth legendarium. A palantír (from Quenya palan, 'far; tir, 'watch over'[T 1]) was an indestructible ball of crystal, used for communication and to see events in other parts of Arda, whether past or future.
